description: globally unique id for this event
name: id

description: BSON id of the user that enters the canvas
name: user_id

description: external user id of the user
name: external_user_id

description: unix timestamp at which the user entered the canvas
name: time

description: API ID of the canvas variation this user entered
name: canvas_variation_id

description: API id of the canvas step this event belongs to
name: canvas_step_id

description: whether the user was enrolled in the control group
name: in_control_group
